summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley discussing 'dark pools' and contains a confidentiality notice. The email emphasizes the confidential nature of the communication and warns against unauthorized use or disclosure.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing financial topics.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley are connected through a personal correspondence discussing financial matters.

keyFacts: The email discusses 'dark pools', which are private exchanges for trading securities.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
Unauthorized use or disclosure of the email content is prohibited.
